subject: Re: The RS box out does itself again
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Hi, Bruce.  Can you clarify how your RS hack system is set-up when 
you are receiving messages such as this one and in the files: "11-26-
07_radio shack hack files_bruce".  They seem much cleaner than what I 
am getting with the 12-469.  Are these recorded right out of the 
speaker with an amped mic picking up your voice and the speaker 
sounds?

Thanks...

LC


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> guy's
> 
> During a session with the RS 470 my technition mike told me that 
our 
> fellow researcher Jeff's uncle was going to die from suffering a 
stroke.
> 
> I informed jeff of the message and sent him the file. He wrote back 
> asking If I could confirm this and get his uncles name.
> 
> I did another quick session with the RS 470 and recieved the name 
mark 
> from my guide lisa just once and then mike and lisa both shouted 
BOB,BOB
> die. 
> 
> I notified Jeff of this and he confirmed he had both an uncle Mark 
And 
> an uncle Bob, after inquiring about the condition of his uncle Bob 
he 
> was informed that his uncle Bob was hospitalised and graveley ill.
> 
> He has not as of now suffered a stroke thank god, but jeff seems to 
> think his prognoses is not good.
> 
> I ask that we all say a prayer for Uncle Bob.
> 
> I posted this and the accompanying file for pure research sake.
> 
> Jeff has said he will keep me posted and I will appropriately keep 
the 
> group informed.
> 
> Bruce
>
